title: The concept of bees in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of bees in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried woman sees a swarm of bees in a dream and feels confused about the interpretation of this vision, until she feels comfortable and at peace. A bee sting on a girl in a dream is a happy dream and indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Seeing bees in a dream is a sign of success and In life for a virgin girl. Interpretation of seeing bees in a girl’s dream indicates abundant sustenance for her, God willing. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman surrounded by bees from everywhere and in the form of organized swarms is evidence of kindness, livelihood, and a lot of money for this coming season, with permission. God. Seeing a large number of bees in a married woman’s dream means that the situation will change for the better. Interpretation of dreams about the bees that circled around her and she was happy in the dream, and this indicates that she expects a child to come to her, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is killing bees This indicates debts, and they will end soon. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing insects in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of bees in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing bees for a pregnant woman in a dream in huge quantities is a sign of the happiness and stability in which this woman lives. If a pregnant woman sees bees And she was pleased with her sight, as this is evidence of the ease of childbirth, and that she will give birth to a boy. Seeing a swarm of bees in a pregnant woman’s dream means sustenance and money for her soon, God willing. Dreaming of bees in large numbers circling around in a dream about a pregnant woman, happiness, and many good things. The meaning of bees in A dream for a divorced woman: Bees are useful and personal insects that attract attention, especially when they walk in swarms. Seeing bees in dreams is always promising visions and translates into a lot of good. If a divorced woman dreams of being stung by bees, she will soon have a lot of food. Seeing a divorced woman being stung by bees will soon have a lot of food. To the house in large quantities indicates that the situation will change for the better. Bees in a dream have a good skin for them and good news is heard about them in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream for a widowBees in a dream vary in interpretation according to different people and places, and they also have a special meaning for the dreamer according to the season. Seeing bees in large numbers in a widow woman’s dream means that soon sadness and sorrow will end from her life. If a widow sees in a dream that a bee stung her and left a mark, this indicates the intense sadness she is experiencing at this time. A divorced woman’s dream of seeing swarms of bees circling around her in The dream is evidence of the traveler’s return in the coming days. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The meaning of bees in a dream for a manSeeing bees in dreams is good and abundant nutrition, and when one sees bees stinging him in a dream, this is evidence of a lot of money for the dreamer. If A married man sees in a dream that he is heading to a place where there is a swarm of bees. This indicates sound decisions in the life of the fortuneteller. A person who is attacked by bees is evidence of the problems and pressures that this person is going through.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a man?

preview.html: We talk through an encyclopedia about the interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream, as God Almighty commanded us to obey him if his orders do not conflict with what is stated in the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet, where obedience to the prince in implementing his orders lies in the completion of a specific action. The jurists defined the prince as issuing orders issued directly. From the public authority to create or amend a project and contract in order to activate a law or project that benefits the state in which it is located and achieves economic and spiritual balance. Some may think that princes do not have time for their personal and family lives because of their busy agenda towards the convicts. But this is not true, while the prince’s most important priorities are the time he spends with his family and transporting them to special occasions, and seeing the prince in a dream did not pass without being noticed. It is observed by dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing a prince in a dream. The opinions of dream interpretation scholars differed regarding seeing a prince in a dream according to the content of the dream. Seeing the dreamer that he is sitting with the prince interprets that the Lord will alleviate his distress and solve his problems in the near future. Seeing a prince in a dream indicates Assuming one of the important and high positions in the state. The dreamer’s dream of sitting with the prince in a dream explains that one of the goals that is disturbing his mind at the present time is approaching, and the time is approaching to achieve it. A young man’s vision of the prince in his dream may indicate that he will marry a girl related to a high-ranking family in society. Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream. Scholars differed regarding the visions of princes in a dream. Some of them herald good news, and some of them came to warn of the approaching wedding date. Seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman in a dream has many interpretations that we emphasize as follows: Seeing Prince Muhammad bin Suleiman generally indicates the dreamer’s ascension to the highest positions in the state, as well as the abundance of livelihood and the abundance of goodness. Ibn Sirin referred to seeing the Crown Prince, kissing him, and sitting next to him in the dream. A dream, indicating that he will obtain a high position among the people and their abundance of power. A non-Saudi vision of Prince Muhammad in a dream indicates that he will travel to the Kingdom, where he will have a lot of money and prestigious positions in the country. Seeing the prince in a dream means that the dreamer has escaped a disaster She is about to approach him, but he must be careful not to get into other problems that await him. Seeing Prince Muhammad in a dream is also interpreted as paying off the debt to the dreamer, as he will receive his livelihood from where he does not expect it. Seeing the prince laughing in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good morals And the extent of his obedience to the commands of God Almighty, His Noble Messenger, and His saints. The girl’s vision of Prince Muhammad in her dream also indicates that one of the distinguished young men who have attained government positions will propose to marry her. However, the patient sees the prince in her dream, which indicates that she will recover in the next few days. If the married woman sees Prince Muhammad in her dream and was late in having children, the vision indicates the approaching pregnancy in the coming months. Seeing princes in a dream for a married woman. Many married women see a

title: Interpretation of a flying horse in a dream: Seeing a horse with wings in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a flying horse indicates kindness and fulfillment of ambitions, and other interpretations that we will explain to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a divorced woman, such as a dream about a white feather. The black-winged horse or mare by Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a flying horse in a dream. Seeing a horse flying means that you will have a life full of goodness, and the owner of the vision will achieve what he wants, whatever it may be, and will live a rich life and have a great lineage. Whoever sees that he is riding a horse while it is flying In the air, or that the horse has wings and is flying, this indicates that he is an honorable person in religion, and that he will succeed in this world and the hereafter, and perhaps his vision is travel. A dream of a flying horse indicates that the dreamer of the vision will increase his livelihood every day more than the other, and this vision is a vision. Praiseworthy and a good vision at its utmost level. And if one sees that he is riding a horse and flying with it, this expresses dignity and prestige, a long journey, harvesting the desired goal, and achieving a balance between the matters of religion and the requirements of the world. If the fortuneteller sees the horse flying in the sky, this indicates He is preparing for a long journey, and he may hate the person. This vision also indicates a shift in circumstances and the person may get married soon. This vision is also a sign of the fruition of an absent desire. Flying a horse in a dream indicates an answer to a prayer and many good things coming to the dreamer, and if the horse approaches the dreamer It is a symbol of marriage for single people and pregnancy for married women, and indicates good opportunities, and if the horse moves away. From the dreamer, the dream indicates disappointment. If the fortuneteller sees the horse flying in the sky, this indicates that he is preparing for a long journey and may hate the person. This vision also indicates a shift in circumstances and he may get married soon. Whoever saw in his dream that he was sitting on a horse, and the horse was flying in the sky, this is evidence that the dreamer will fulfill all his desires, and God Almighty will provide him abundantly, and God knows best. Interpretation of a horse with wings in a dream: Seeing a horse with wings And it flies high in the sky, indicating glory, prestige and power. Interpretation of riding a flying horse in a dream: Whoever sees that he is riding a horse with two wings, then he will reach a great kingdom, if he is from his family, otherwise it is an invasion of lust and domination. And whoever sees that he is riding a horse and then gets off, then he will regret something. It was said that Seeing a wild horse is interpreted by a crazy man. There is no good in riding except in the place of animals, and there is no good in riding on a wall, roof, or silo except seeing the wing of the horse on which it flies between the sky and the earth, for this is an honor. To the world and religion by traveling. They said: Whoever saw knights flying in the air, there were fighting and wars. For a person to see himself riding a winged horse and flying with it from above indicates the respect that this dreamer has in his worldly and religious affairs. When you see a horse with two wings flying, it shows honor. Religion and the world with close journeys, and he also obtains a great and mighty kingdom. Interpretation of a horse with wings in a dream: If the dreamer sees a horse with wings or a mare flying, this is evidence of the glory of the subject and the high status that awaits the person who saw the flying horse.

title: Giving birth in a married woman’s dream, complete interpretation and meanings

preview.html: Giving birth in a dream for a married woman means that the moment of birth is what preoccupies the pregnant woman from the first moments of knowing her job, and this anxiety and tension continues with her until she gives birth to her fetus in good health without facing anything. Difficulties in this, in addition to her fear of this moment, her fear of her fetus and what it will look like and what will happen to it during birth and after birth as well, and because she thinks about this a lot, this is reflected. In her dreams. The birth of a married woman in a dream. Daring. The dreams that a pregnant woman sees in her sleep are a sign of what she is thinking or an indication of what she is carrying in her stomach about the gender of the fetus, so the interpretation of childbirth in a dream is for a married woman who has. A boy. If a non-pregnant woman dreams that she is going to give birth, this is good news that she will become pregnant and give birth to a child similar to the child she saw in her dream, God willing. Seeing the birth of two male children together is a harbinger of something bad happening to the dreamer and her family, so beware of everything that comes. Also, childbirth In a dream, it heralds salvation, the end of all crises, and a change in the dreamer’s condition to another good state. Also, seeing the moment in which she gave birth to a boy in a dream for a married woman is good for her and her family, God willing. This vision also expresses good news in achieving what one seeks and dreams of. And that all an individual’s efforts will not end in failure, but rather in success. Whereas, if she sees in her dream the birth of an attractive male child, the newly married woman indicates that she will give birth to a child that will change her life for the better. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the birth of a beautiful girl for a pregnant woman in detail. Birth of a married woman In a dream, a girl. The gender of the baby that a married woman sees in her dream has signs and connotations that differ according to the gender of the baby that she sees in her dream. So what is the interpretation of a dream that a married woman gives birth to a girl? Seeing the birth of a girl in a dream for a married woman indicates good news for the dreamer, in addition to her return to God and avoiding Taboo. It also indicates having the insight into a close-knit family, a wonderful life partner, and living away from trouble. If she dreams that she miscarried a girl, this symbolizes the permanent differences she experiences with her partner as a result of his bad ways. Also, her partner is unable to perform his duties towards the house, which causes In arguments approaching separation, then his situation will change for the better, God willing. Seeing her giving birth is also a sign of a new beginning for the dreamer, bringing goodness and great living. As well as the end of any crises she was going through, whether financial or otherwise. It indicates her career advancement if she She works and that she has children who brag about their studies and morals. See also: Interpretation of seeing a woman I know pregnant in a dream. A cesarean section is a frightening and unpleasant thing for a pregnant woman, and seeing it in a dream can bring fear to the heart of the woman who sees it. title: Interpretation of a dream about a person hugging and crying for a single and married woman

preview.html: Today, through the Encyclopedia website, we present an article on the interpretation of dreams of a person’s chest and his crying. Dreams have a wide and vast world, as they contain many countless symbols and signs. There are many indications of its truthfulness, the closest of which is the interpretation of dreams that occur to people after a while or on the same day of the dream, and in this there are many evidences such as mentioning visions in the Holy Qur’an. As God Almighty says in His beloved book, Surat Yusuf, verse 4, “When Joseph said to his father, ‘My father, I saw eleven stars and the sun and the moon. I saw them prostrating before me.’” God Almighty is true, and at the end of the surah, the vision of the Prophet of God, Joseph, came true. Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone and crying Many people are confused about the interpretation of their dreams and understanding their meaning, then we learn together about the interpretation of seeing a person’s chest in a dream and crying. The dream may cause some surprise, but it will still be surprising when we do it. Learn the meaning, crying in a dream is one of the good and promising visions, and below we will learn about the interpretation of the dream in detail: Seeing hugging and crying in a dream is interpreted as a good vision and has pleasant connotations. The father's chest in a dream indicates the happiness, security and peace that the dreamer needs. Crying and complaining about someone in a dream means loss and loss of money, and there are those who interpret it as a loss in the world and in religion. Dreaming of hugging loved ones indicates longing and love, and also shows constant thinking about it. Hugging strangers in a dream symbolizes the need to be careful in dealing with these people and all strangers during this time. And whoever dreams that he is hugging a dead person, this means that he has committed many sins and disobedience in his life and he must repent. Interpretation of seeing the embrace of the enemy in a dream, it is a good skin, meeting a strange lover, close and also shows that you fall in love a lot. Interpretation scholars say: In the embrace of loved ones, there is a strong flame in the dream, especially if it is between a man and a woman to marry and be happy. Interpretation of a dream of a person hugging and crying for a single person The girl hopes The single woman always feels safe and calm and is accompanied by the passion of falling in love and working in a prestigious job, she is a dreamy butterfly in the sky of life. Seeing hugging and crying in an unmarried woman's dream is considered a commendable dream with good connotations. Crying and hugging in an unmarried woman's dream indicates her need for a good husband who will protect her and live together in happiness and security. The girl's vision shows that the one who hugs her behind her is safe and self-controlled, she needs a man behind her who protects her from all sadness and harm. Seeing hugging in an unmarried woman's dream means that God will grant her a righteous husband who fears God inside her. Dream interpreters say in this vision, if a single girl dreams of hugging and crying and there is someone who proposes to her, this is good news that this man is fair. Interpretation of a dream of hugging and crying for a married woman A married woman carries a lot of burdens on her shoulders, has a lot of worries, and also has great dreams and hopes. Seeing hugs in an unmarried woman’s dream means that God will give her a righteous, God-fearing husband within her. Dream interpreters say in this vision, if a single girl dreams With a hug and crying, and there is someone who proposes to her, this is good news that this man is fair. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman hugging and crying: A married woman carries a lot of burdens on her shoulders, she has a lot of worries, and she also has great dreams and hopes. Always dreaming of a safe home full of love, peace and pain

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person with a living smile for a single or married person according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of the dead smiling for single people: Seeing the deceased in a dream laughing and smiling is one of the visions that carry many different interpretations by different interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of the dead smiling for single, married and pregnant people. It should be noted that seeing the dead person’s smile in a dream is similar to the rest of the visions that can It carries a benign or harmless meaning depending on the dreamer himself or the events of the dream itself. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of the dream of the smile of the deceased. Before we reach the interpretation of the dream of the dead smiling for single people, we will explain through the site the various different interpretations of seeing the dead smiling of the living, which are: Dream interpretation scholars have interpreted the vision of the deceased In a dream to indicate their status in the afterlife. If one sees in a dream that his deceased father is smiling at him, then this vision is considered a message to the monarch assuring him of his father’s satisfaction and satisfaction and the rightness of what he is doing. But if one sees his deceased father and he is not smiling and unhappy, then this may indicate The vision indicates that the dreamer is doing some wrong actions and needs to re-examine himself before it is too late. Commentators have explained that seeing a dead person smiling at a living person in a dream generally means kindness and living. This vision may indicate marriage or engagement. This vision may also indicate that The dreamer will find a new job. Dream interpreters explain that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream a group of dead people wearing new clothes, smiling and laughing, then this vision shows her good condition and high status in God Almighty. This vision also indicates the ease of her affairs and the achievement of success and excellence in All aspects of her life. If an unmarried girl sees a dead person whom she knows and he appears in a dream as a rich man living in a palace and smiling, then this vision shows that person’s status and status in the Lord of the Worlds. This vision also shows that she will go through many problems, but she will be able to overcome them all. , and her status will rise and reach the highest ranks. Dream interpretation scholars explain that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream a dead person who is worried or crying after he was smiling and happy, then this vision is a sign that this girl’s condition will change from better to worse. This vision shows Also, this girl will disobey God’s orders and behave badly. I mean the interpretation of a dream about the smile of dead people for single people. This dead man does not know the truth, is evidence of this girl’s excellence in her studies, and that she will obtain the highest grades. If an unmarried girl sees her dead brother and smiles at her, this is a sign of This girl will achieve her ambitions and goals in the coming period, God willing. But E

title: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream (a bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin).

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream On various occasions, we wake up every day to the sound of birds announcing the beginning of a new day and a bright morning, and there is no doubt that their voice brings hope and optimism to the soul and encourages work and activity, but there is definitely an indication that you see birds in a dream.Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream explains Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees birds in his dream is a light and cheerful man who helps put a smile on the faces of many people. Seeing birds in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has a high status and money, but he often quarrels with those around him, and seeing birds may indicate... The dream is about a woman who enjoys great beauty. As for hearing the voices of birds, it means hearing good words, and he can get a lot of money without difficulty if he sees many birds in his dream. And whoever finds a bird in his dream, this is a sign of his closeness to a person who has power in reality. And for the sick person Whoever sees a bird eating love, seeing it is a sign of death, God forbid. If the bird falls on the fortuneteller’s head, this is a sign that the newcomer will return to his family. Seeing a white bird indicates many good deeds, while a black bird is one of bad deeds. A bird in a dream for a son Serene A detailed interpretation of a bird in a dream. Sparrows are considered one of the most common types of birds that are acquired and cared for at home and among the most popular species for some because of their positive effect on mental health, as they give a feeling of vitality. Happiness and psychological comfort, and it also includes many happy colors. As for seeing it in a dream, some believe that it is one of the good visions that indicate goodness because of its symbols in reality. Does the bird have positive interpretations in a dream? We will learn this through an encyclopedia where I will show you what the great dream interpreters said about this vision. Imam Ibn Sirin went on to explain seeing the bird as one of the praiseworthy visions that portends the coming of abundant goodness for the dreamer. When the dreamer sees that he is feeding birds with worms in a dream, this is one of the dreams. Hateful, which represents going through crises in the dreamer’s life. When the dreamer sees a large number of birds in a dream, this expresses the abundance of money that comes to the dreamer without hardship. When the dreamer dreams that he is chirping with the bird, this vision is an indication of how strong the dreamer’s relationship with his family is. In the event that he sees bird eggs in a dream, this promises him good news that he will earn a lot of money, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees in a dream the disappearance of the bird in the cage and the presence of an animal in it that is predatory, then this vision is good for the dreamer that his situation will change for the better. In the case of dreaming of the presence of a bird Standing on the dreamer’s shoulder, this dream promises him good news of a change in his situation for the better in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing a bird eating in a dream indicates the lack of livelihood that the dreamer will receive, but if it is slaughtered, this is good news for the dreamer that what he wants in reality will come true. Seeing dead birds falling from the sky symbolizes something bad for the dreamer, as it expresses his disobedience and frequent committing forbidden acts.

title: Interpretation of bad breath in a dream

preview.html: The bad smell or the good smell emanates from the mouth of an unmarried or married girl or a pregnant woman, and I dreamed of someone smelling my mouth or I smelled someone’s mouth by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of bad breath in a dream. Bad smell in the mouth indicates the presence of a person who does not care about what he says, and says everything he thinks, unnecessary and very inquisitive. He does not balance his words with logic before he says them and he does not know whether what he is saying is true or bad. This person is also described as defaming himself, lying a lot and filling his mouth with words and it will become a cause of headaches. If the dreamer sees or feels the smell of his mouth in a dream, this means that he He is proud of his money and possessions and because of this people will consider him arrogant. In order to characterize that particular person, he will be banned from society. The smell from someone’s mouth indicates some things or situations that are bothering the dreamer. The person will have some tense days. The feeling or feeling as if a bad odor is coming from the mouth in the dream is a feeling parallel to waking life with the feeling of guilt or remorse that the dreamer may have done to someone, either through hurtful or bad words. False testimony, gossip, and injustice in speech and language. A steamy mouth in a dream (a mouth from which steam or smoke comes out) could also indicate that the dreamer is slandering others verbally, and it also shows the consumption of illicit money. Whoever sees a beautiful, clean, and elegant person with no blemish, He charms you and tries to get close to you, and his mouth smells bad. If the mouth tastes and smells sweet, it is evidence of a good life. If a person dreams that his mouth smells good, this means that good and kind words come out of it. Anything related to the mouth, such as food or smell, shows what it is, and a good smell shows the words. The kindness with which others speak, and sweet food has the same interpretation. Interpretation of bad breath in a dream The interpretation of bad breath in a dream indicates a feeling of guilt or remorse that the dreamer may commit against someone, either through malicious speech, evil slander, false testimony, or gossip. Slander or injustice with speech and tongue, and a mouth full of steam in a dream (a mouth that comes out of steam or smoke) could also indicate that the viewer is slandering others with speech, and it also shows that he is eating ill-gotten money. It is forbidden, so you have to be careful and investigate what is legal, and if the mouth has a sweet taste and smell, then this is evidence of a good life. A good smell in a dream shows the good words spoken by others and eating food. Whoever dreams of a bad smell (i.e. a bad smell comes out of his mouth or... An unpleasant taste in his mouth) His dream indicates that he speaks a lot of bad words, or it may indicate that he says them. Many words of self-praise. But if a person sees himself in a dream as if he is still evaporating (that is, a bad breath does not leave him), then this indicates that he has a very obscene reason. Seeing the smell of the mouth in a dream indicates the presence of a person who does not care about what he says, He says everything that is on his mind, he is very hesitant and curious, he does not balance his words with

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream: Is skin good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dreamIn detail God Almighty creates in every girl the maternal instinct, so all girls dream from childhood of becoming mothers, and many of them may dream of pregnancy even if they are not married in reality, but what they dream of is. pregnant woman? Is this vision logical or is it just self-talk? We will explain this through the following lines in the encyclopedia. In general, a dream about pregnancy symbolizes the dreamer’s attempt to make new friends and introduce anything new into his life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant. Her vision indicates that she will be exposed to financial problems and crises. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a male child and does not know his gender in reality. This means that she will actually give birth to a boy. But if the dreamer is pregnant with a female in reality, and dreams that she is pregnant with a male. This is an indication that she will face health problems during pregnancy as a result of disputes that arise in her family or because of not following the doctor’s instructions. A married woman’s dream that she is pregnant indicates a financial crisis within her family as a result of her husband’s problems at work. Who sees in her dream that she is pregnant and already divorced? This vision shows that he is trying to overcome the worries that he is suffering from. If this pregnancy is from her ex-husband; This indicates the intensity of her love for her ex-husband and her desire to return to him. Seeing a pregnancy in its infancy in a dream indicates that fears will affect the dreamer for a period of time. If a woman dreams that she is pregnant and about to give birth. The vision portends her imminent death from her worries and problems. A man’s dream of a woman who does not give birth during pregnancy indicates solutions to problems in the dreamer’s financial, professional, and personal life. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman. Interpretation scholars say that a dream about a pregnant woman indicates that the dreamer will suffer from sorrows and worries. If one sees in Dreaming that his mother is pregnant. His vision showed that his mother was truly happy and comfortable. Who sees in his dream that a woman is pregnant with a boy? This is a sign that the dreamer’s father feels fear and anxiety. If the pregnant woman who appeared in the dream is traveling. This means that she suffers while traveling. If she is a student? This is a sign of exhaustion in recalling her lessons. When someone dreams that a pregnant woman they know is getting married. This means that she will soon give birth and give birth to a healthy child, and she and her family will receive a lot of goodness. Dreaming of a dead mother during pregnancy indicates the dreamer’s feeling of sadness and anxiety in his life. This dream may indicate the mother’s need to pray for her and give zakat on her behalf. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream in a dream: If An unmarried girl dreamed that the woman she knew was pregnant and that her stomach was bloated. The vision heralds the appearance of what makes her happy and puts a smile on her face. Whoever sees in her dream that the woman she knows is pregnant, but she frowns in the dream. This is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety for a period of time. A single girl’s dream that she is hitting a pregnant woman indicates that this woman will achieve many benefits from the dreamer. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is breaking a pregnant woman’s stomach,

Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream in a dream: If An unmarried girl dreamed that the woman she knew was pregnant and that her stomach was bloated. The vision heralds the appearance of what makes her happy and puts a smile on her face. Whoever sees in her dream that the woman she knows is pregnant, but she frowns in the dream. This is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety for a period of time. A single girl’s dream that she is hitting a pregnant woman indicates that this woman will achieve many benefits from the dreamer.
